R

removeToken(Token) - Method in class location.Location
Removes a token from the set of tokens at this location.
rollDice() - Static method in class cluedo.Cluedo
Gets a random number between 1 and 12 representing a dice roll for moving around the board.
rollDice6() - Static method in class cluedo.Cluedo
Gets a random number between 1 and 6 representing a dice roll for moving around the board.
